participant_1.name: Megan Carter
participant_1.personality: Megan is passionate, creative, and expressive. She loves to share stories through her music and connects deeply with her audience.
participant_1.background: i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats. we spent summers ring at national parks. i started playing guitar when i was three. i grew up in the industry.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Jake is determined, straightforward, and has a strong sense of duty. He values loyalty and has a love for adventure.
participant_2.background: i live in canada. i didn't graduate high school. i'm in the army. my grandfather served in world war a. my favourite food is shawarma.
